MADONNA, PUBLIC MONEY, POLITICS AND THE BRAZILIAN TRAGEDY

 Private bank using public money to promote a millionaire commemorative show in a city full of social problems, with enormous daily citizen insecurity, precarious health and education and even hunger.

 In Rio Grande do Sul, an environmental disaster of natural causes and an incompetent and insensitive government in providing relief, which uses the tragedy to engage in politicking.

 A corrupt press that opportunely covers up presidential abuses and has a political side.  All at the same time now, one thing at a time.

 Reflections of a sick and directionless country. üòû
